alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued August 06 at 1:15AM PDT until August 06 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Areas of dense fog reducing visibility to less than one quarter mile. Localized visibility as low as 50 to 100 yards. * WHERE...Central Oregon Coast. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility can vary considerably over short distances and time. Drivers and cyclists should be prepared for rapid changes in visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Cyclists and pedestrians should consider wearing bright or reflective clothing to increase the chance of being seen by others in the dense fog.
